subject: Football
Sporting Goods and Equipment
Leather and Leather Goods
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Jane Helser recently retired from working at the Wilson Sporting Goods factory in Ada, Ohio, where employees accustomed to precise specifications see the Patriots’ deflation scandal as a distant issue.
